def prime (a):
    b=1
    p=0
    while b<a:
        f=a%b
        if f==0:
            p+=1
        b+=1
    if p<2:
        return True
n=input()
for i in range(n):
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    c=0
    for j in range(a[0],a[-1]+1):
        d=str(j)
        if j!=1 and d==d[::-1] and prime(j)==True:
            c+=j
    print c
